00058 LibraryHandler::LibraryHandler(VLNVDialer* dialer, MainWindow* parent): 
00059 QTabWidget(parent), data_(), 
00060 treeModel_(),
00061 hierarchyModel_(),
00062 searchWidget_(),
00063 treeWidget_(),
00064 hierarchyWidget_(),
00065 objects_() {
00066 
00067         connect(this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00068                 parent, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00069         connect(this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00070                 parent, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00071 
00072         setWindowTitle(tr("LibraryHandler"));
00073 
00074         data_ = QSharedPointer<LibraryData>(new LibraryData(this));
00075         data_->openLibraryFile();
00076 
00077         treeModel_ = QSharedPointer<LibraryTreeModel>(
00078                         new LibraryTreeModel(this, data_.data(), this));
00079 
00080         hierarchyModel_ = QSharedPointer<HierarchyModel>(
00081                 new HierarchyModel(data_.data(), this, this));
00082 
00083         // create the connections between models and library handler
00084         syncronizeModels();
00085 
00086         treeWidget_ = QSharedPointer<LibraryTreeWidget>(
00087                         new LibraryTreeWidget(dialer, this, treeModel_.data(), this));
00088 
00089         connect(treeWidget_.data(), SIGNAL(itemSelected(const VLNV&)),
00090                 this, SIGNAL(itemSelected(const VLNV&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00091 
00092         hierarchyWidget_ = QSharedPointer<HierarchyWidget>(
00093                 new HierarchyWidget(dialer, this, this, hierarchyModel_.data()));
00094 
00095         connect(hierarchyWidget_.data(), SIGNAL(componentSelected(const VLNV&)),
00096                 this, SIGNAL(itemSelected(const VLNV&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00097 
00098         addTab(hierarchyWidget_.data(), tr("Hierarchy"));
00099         addTab(treeWidget_.data(), tr("Plain IP-Xact"));
00100 }

00105 void LibraryHandler::syncronizeModels() {
00106 
00107         // connect the signals from the data model
00108         connect(data_.data(), SIGNAL(removeVLNV(VLNV*)),
00109                 treeModel_.data(), SLOT(onRemoveVLNV(VLNV*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00110         connect(data_.data(), SIGNAL(removeVLNV(VLNV*)),
00111                 hierarchyModel_.data(), SLOT(onRemoveVLNV(VLNV*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00112 
00113         connect(data_.data(), SIGNAL(resetModel()),
00114                 treeModel_.data(), SLOT(onResetModel()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00115         connect(data_.data(), SIGNAL(resetModel()),
00116                 hierarchyModel_.data(), SLOT(onResetModel()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00117 
00118         // signals from data model to library handler
00119         connect(data_.data(), SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00120                 this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00121         connect(data_.data(), SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00122                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00123         connect(data_.data(), SIGNAL(openDesign(const VLNV&)),
00124                 this, SLOT(onOpenDesign(const VLNV&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);

00126                 this, SLOT(onEditItem(const VLNV&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);

00129         connect(data_.data(), SIGNAL(createComponent(const VLNV&)),
00130                 this, SLOT(onCreateNewItem(const VLNV&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);

00132                 this, SLOT(onCreateDesign(const VLNV&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00133

00149                 this, SLOT(onCreateNewItem(const VLNV&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00150         connect(treeModel_.data(), SIGNAL(createAbsDef(const VLNV&)),
00151                 this, SLOT(onCreateAbsDef(const VLNV&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00152         connect(treeModel_.data(), SIGNAL(createComponent(const VLNV&)),

00183 void LibraryHandler::onExportItem( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
00184         
00185         // invalid vlnvs are not exported
00186         if (!vlnv.isValid())
00187                 return;
00188 
00189         // get the current working directory and save it to be restored in the end
00190         // of the function
00191         QDir savedWorkingDirectory = QDir::current();
00192 
00193         QSettings settings;
00194         QString defaultPath = settings.value("general/defaultDir", QDir::homePath()).toString();
00195 
00196         // ask the target directory where the package is to be exported
00197         QString targetPath = QFileDialog::getExistingDirectory(this, 
00198                 tr("Select the location to export library to"),
00199                 defaultPath);
00200 
00201         // if no target path was specified
00202         if (targetPath.isEmpty())
00203                 return;
00204 
00205         // create a QDir instance of the target directory
00206         QDir target(targetPath);
00207 
00208         // The user hasn't chosen "yes to all" or "no to all" yet
00209         bool yesToAll = false;
00210         bool noToAll = false;
00211         // info of copied files is stored so same file is not copied multiple times
00212         fileList handledFiles;
00213         copyFiles(target, vlnv, handledFiles, yesToAll, noToAll);
00214 
00215         QDir::setCurrent(savedWorkingDirectory.absolutePath());
00216         return;
00217 }
00218 
00219 void LibraryHandler::onExportItems(const QList<VLNV*>& vlnvs) {
00220         
00221         // if no VLNVs to export
00222         if (vlnvs.isEmpty())
00223                 return;
00224 
00225         // get the current working directory and save it to be restored in the end
00226         // of the function
00227         QDir savedWorkingDirectory = QDir::current();
00228 
00229         QSettings settings;
00230         QString defaultPath = settings.value("general/defaultDir", QDir::homePath()).toString();
00231 
00232         // ask the target directory where the package is to be exported
00233         QString targetPath = QFileDialog::getExistingDirectory(this, 
00234                 tr("Select the location to export library to"),
00235                 defaultPath);
00236 
00237         // if no target path was specified
00238         if (targetPath.isEmpty())
00239                 return;
00240 
00241         // create a QDir instance of the target directory
00242         QDir target(targetPath);
00243 
00244         // The user hasn't chosen "yes to all" or "no to all" yet
00245         bool yesToAll = false;
00246         bool noToAll = false;
00247 
00248         // info of copied files is stored so same file is not copied multiple times
00249         fileList handledFiles;
00250 
00251         foreach (VLNV* vlnv, vlnvs) {
00252 
00253                 // invalid vlnvs are not exported
00254                 if (!vlnv->isValid())
00255                         continue;
00256 
00257                 // copy the files to the specified location from each vlnv
00258                 copyFiles(target, *vlnv, handledFiles, yesToAll, noToAll);
00259         }
00260 
00261         QDir::setCurrent(savedWorkingDirectory.absolutePath());
00262         return;
00263 }
00264 
00265 void LibraryHandler::copyFiles(QDir& target, const VLNV& vlnv, 
00266 fileList& handledFiles, bool& yesToAll, bool& noToAll) {
00267 
00268         // parse the vlnv to get the dependencies and also copy them
00269         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> item = getModel(vlnv);
00270 
00271         // if pointer is null the vlnv did not exist or the document was not
00272         // of supported type
00273         if (!item) {    
00274                 return;
00275         }
00276 
00277         // save the current working directory to be restored later
00278         QDir savedWorkingDir = QDir::current();
00279 
00280         QDir::setCurrent(target.absolutePath());
00281         QDir vlnvTarget;
00282 
00283         // get the path that matches the VLNV structure
00284         QString dirPath = vlnv.createDirPath();
00285 
00286         // and create the path to the target directory
00287         if (!vlnvTarget.mkpath(dirPath)) {
00288                 emit errorMessage(tr(
00289                         "Could not create directory structure, aborting."));
00290 
00291                 // restore the previous working directory to avoid messing with
00292                 // caller function
00293                 QDir::setCurrent(savedWorkingDir.absolutePath());
00294                 return;
00295         }
00296         // set the directory to the place to copy the vlnv file to
00297         vlnvTarget.setPath(dirPath);
00298 
00299         QString documentPath = data_->getPath(vlnv);
00300         if (documentPath.isNull()) {
00301 
00302                 // restore the previous working directory to avoid messing with
00303                 // caller function
00304                 QDir::setCurrent(savedWorkingDir.absolutePath());
00305                 return;
00306         }
00307 
00308         // contains the info of the source file
00309         QFileInfo sourceFileInfo(documentPath);
00310         // points to the source directory where all relative paths must be
00311         // compared to
00312         QDir sourceDir(sourceFileInfo.absoluteDir());
00313 
00314         // copy the file from source to destination
00315         copyFile(sourceFileInfo, vlnvTarget, handledFiles, yesToAll, noToAll);
00316 
00317         // get the list of the dependency files for this vlnv
00318         QStringList fileList = item->getDependentFiles();
00319         // copy the files
00320         copyFiles(fileList, sourceDir, vlnvTarget, handledFiles, yesToAll, noToAll);
00321 
00322         // get the vlnvs that are needed by this current vlnv and also copy them
00323         QList<VLNV> vlnvList = item->getDependentVLNVs();
00324 
00325         for (int i = 0; i < vlnvList.size(); ++i) {
00326                 copyFiles(target, vlnvList.at(i), handledFiles, yesToAll, noToAll);
00327         }
00328 
00329         // restore the previous working directory to avoid messing with
00330         // caller function
00331         QDir::setCurrent(savedWorkingDir.absolutePath());
00332         return;
00333 }
00334 
00335 void LibraryHandler::copyFile(QFileInfo& source, QDir& target,
00336 fileList& handledFiles, bool& yesToAll, bool& noToAll) {
00337 
00338         // if the source file has already been handled previously within
00339         // this copy operation
00340         if (handledFiles.contains(source)) {
00341                 return;
00342         }
00343 
00344         // if the source doesn't exist
00345         if (!source.exists()) {
00346                 emit errorMessage(tr("Could not find file: %1").arg(source.fileName()));
00347                 return;
00348         }
00349 
00350         // save the current directory to be restored at the end of the function
00351         QDir savedCurrentDir = QDir::current();
00352 
00353         // set the current working directory to the destination
00354         QDir::setCurrent(target.absolutePath());
00355 
00356         // file existed so add it to handledFiles list to indicate that
00357         // we don't need to check later anymore in possible recursive
00358         // function calls
00359         handledFiles.append(source);
00360 
00361         // set QFile instance of the source file
00362         QFile sourceFile(source.filePath());
00363 
00364         // if a file with same name as source already exists in the
00365         // target directory
00366         if (QFile::exists(source.fileName())) {
00367 
00368                 QMessageBox::StandardButton answer = QMessageBox::Yes;
00369 
00370                 // if no to all has been clicked, return false and dont copy
00371                 if (noToAll) {
00372                         answer = QMessageBox::No;
00373                 }
00374                 // if no "yes to all" or "no to all" has been clicked then ask user
00375                 // what to do
00376                 else if (!yesToAll && !noToAll) {
00377                         QString title = tr("overwrite file?");
00378                         QString text = tr("The file ");
00379                         text += source.fileName();
00380                         text += tr(" already exists, would you like to overwrite"
00381                                 " the file?");
00382 
00383                         // ask the user to overwrite the file, if user says no we
00384                         // quit the function and return false
00385 
00386                         answer = QMessageBox::question(
00387                                 this, title, text, QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::No |
00388                                 QMessageBox::YesToAll | QMessageBox::NoToAll ,
00389                                 QMessageBox::No);
00390                 }
00391 
00392                 // if user says "no" to overwrite
00393                 if ( answer     == QMessageBox::No) {
00394                         // the user said no to overwrite so return
00395 
00396                         // restore the current directory to the state it was before this
00397                         // function
00398                         QDir::setCurrent(savedCurrentDir.absolutePath());
00399                         return;
00400                 }
00401                 // if user clicked "yes to all"
00402                 else if ( answer == QMessageBox::YesToAll ) {
00403                         yesToAll = true;
00404                         noToAll = false;
00405                 }
00406                 // if user clicked "no to all"
00407                 else if ( answer == QMessageBox::NoToAll ) {
00408                         yesToAll = false;
00409                         noToAll = true;
00410 
00411                         // restore the current directory to the state it was before this function
00412                         QDir::setCurrent(savedCurrentDir.absolutePath());
00413                         return;
00414                 }
00415 
00416                 // if answer was "yes" or "yes to all" we remove the old file to
00417                 // copy the new in its place
00418                 if (answer == QMessageBox::Yes || answer == QMessageBox::YesToAll) {
00419                         QFile target(source.fileName());
00420 
00421                         // if a file with same name already exists it is first removed
00422                         // if user wanted to overwrite
00423                         target.remove();
00424                 }
00425         }
00426         // if the copying of the file can not be done
00427         if (!sourceFile.copy(source.fileName())) {
00428                 emit errorMessage(tr("File %1 couldn't be copied").arg(source.fileName()));
00429         }
00430 
00431         // restore the current directory to the state it was before this function
00432         QDir::setCurrent(savedCurrentDir.absolutePath());
00433         return;
00434 }
00435 
00436 void LibraryHandler::copyFiles(const QStringList& files, QDir& sourceDir,
00437 QDir& targetDir, fileList& handledFiles, bool& yesToAll, bool& noToAll) {
00438 
00439         // save the current directory to be restored later
00440         QDir savedCurrentDir = QDir::current();
00441 
00442         // set the target as current directory
00443         QDir::setCurrent(targetDir.absolutePath());
00444 
00445         for (int i = 0; i < files.size(); ++i) {
00446 
00447                 QFileInfo sourceInfo(sourceDir.absoluteFilePath(files.at(i)));
00448 
00449                 // if the file can't be found, find the next file
00450                 if (!sourceInfo.exists()) {
00451                         continue;
00452                 }
00453 
00454                 QFileInfo targetInfo(files.at(i));
00455 
00456                 // create directories to store the file in a correct relative path
00457                 if (!QDir::current().mkpath(targetInfo.absolutePath())) {
00458                         emit errorMessage(tr("Could not create directory structure for file %1").arg(
00459                                 targetInfo.fileName()));
00460                 }
00461 
00462                 // set the target directory to copy the file into
00463                 QDir targetDir(targetInfo.absolutePath());
00464 
00465                 copyFile(sourceInfo, targetDir, handledFiles, yesToAll, noToAll);
00466         }
00467 
00468         // set the current directory to the state it was before this function
00469         QDir::setCurrent(savedCurrentDir.absolutePath());
00470         return;
00471 }

00481 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> LibraryHandler::getModel( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
00482 
00483         // if object has already been previously parsed
00484         if (objects_.contains(vlnv)) {
00485                 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> copy = objects_.value(vlnv)->clone();
00486                 return copy;
00487         }
00488         else {
00489                 if (!data_->contains(vlnv)) {
00490                         emit noticeMessage(tr("VLNV %1:%2:%3:%4 was not found in library").arg(
00491                                 vlnv.getVendor()).arg(
00492                                 vlnv.getLibrary()).arg(
00493                                 vlnv.getName()).arg(
00494                                 vlnv.getVersion()));
00495                         return QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent>();
00496                 }
00497                 
00498                 VLNV toCreate = vlnv;
00499                 // make sure the vlnv is of correct type
00500                 toCreate.setType(data_->getType(vlnv));
00501 
00502                 // get path to the document
00503                 QString path = data_->getPath(toCreate);
00504 
00505                 // if the file was not found
00506                 if (path.isEmpty()) {
00507                         return QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent>();
00508                 }
00509 
00510                 // create file handle and use it to read the IP-Xact document into memory
00511                 QFile file(path);
00512                 QDomDocument doc;
00513                 doc.setContent(&file);
00514                 file.close();
00515 
00516                 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp;
00517 
00518                 try {
00519                         // create correct type of object and cast the pointer
00520                         switch (toCreate.getType()) {
00521                         case VLNV::BUSDEFINITION: {
00522                                 libComp = QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent>(new BusDefinition(doc));
00523                                 break;
00524                                                                           }
00525                         case VLNV::COMPONENT: {
00526                                 libComp = QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent>(new Component(doc));
00527                                 break;
00528                                                                   }
00529                         case VLNV::DESIGN: {
00530                                 libComp = QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent>(new Design(doc));
00531                                 break;
00532                                                            }
00533 
00534                         case VLNV::GENERATORCHAIN: {
00535                                 libComp = QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent>(new GeneratorChain(doc));
00536                                 break;
00537                                                                            }
00538                         case VLNV::DESIGNCONFIGURATION: {
00539                                 libComp = QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent>(new DesignConfiguration(doc));
00540                                 break;
00541                                                                                         }
00542 
00543                         case VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION: {
00544                                 libComp = QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent>(new AbstractionDefinition(doc));
00545                                 break;
00546                                                                                           }
00547                         default: {
00548                                 emit noticeMessage(tr("Document was not supported type"));
00549                                 return QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent>();
00550                                          }
00551                         }
00552                 }
00553                 // if an exception occurred during the parsing
00554                 catch (Parse_error error) {
00555                         QString errorMsg(error.what() + QString(" ") + error.errorMsg() +
00556                                 tr(" within file: %1").arg(path));
00557                         emit errorMessage(errorMsg);
00558                         return QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent>();
00559                 }
00560                 catch (...) {
00561                         emit errorMessage(
00562                                 tr("Error occurred during parsing of the document %1").arg(path));
00563                         return QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent>();
00564                 }
00565                 
00566                 // save the parsed item to the map and return pointer to it
00567                 objects_.insert(vlnv, libComp);
00568                 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> copy = libComp->clone();
00569                 return copy;
00570         }
00571 }

00583 const QString LibraryHandler::getPath( const VLNV& vlnv ) const {
00584         if (!vlnv.isValid())
00585                 return QString();
00586         else
00587                 return data_->getPath(vlnv);
00588 }
00589 
00590 void LibraryHandler::writeModelToFile( const QString path, 
00591                                                                           QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> model ) {
00592         // if the given file path is not valid
00593         if (path.isEmpty()) {
00594                 return;
00595         }
00596 
00597         VLNV vlnv = *model->getVlnv();
00598         Q_ASSERT(!data_->contains(vlnv));
00599         Q_ASSERT(!objects_.contains(vlnv));
00600 
00601     // Create the path if it does not exist.
00602     if (!QDir(path).exists())
00603     {
00604         if (!QDir().mkpath(path))
00605         {
00606             QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Warning, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
00607                                tr("Could not create directory \"%1\".").arg(path));
00608             msgBox.exec();
00609             return;
00610         }
00611     }
00612 
00613         QString filePath = path + "/" + vlnv.getName() + "." + vlnv.getVersion() + ".xml";
00614 
00615         // create file info instance representing the file in the path
00616         QFileInfo oldFileInfo;
00617         oldFileInfo.setFile(filePath);
00618 
00619         // remove the old file
00620         if (oldFileInfo.exists()) {
00621                 QFile oldFile(oldFileInfo.filePath());
00622                 oldFile.remove();
00623         }
00624 
00625         // create a new file
00626         QFile newFile(filePath);
00627         if (!newFile.open(QFile::WriteOnly | QFile::Truncate)) {
00628                 emit errorMessage(tr("Could not open file %1 for writing").arg(filePath));
00629                 return;
00630         }
00631 
00632         // write the parsed model
00633         try {
00634                 model->write(newFile);
00635         }
00636         catch (Write_error error) {
00637                 QString errorMsg = QString("%1 %2 within file: %3").arg(
00638                         error.what()).arg(
00639                         error.errorMsg()).arg(
00640                         newFile.fileName());
00641                 emit errorMessage(errorMsg);
00642 
00643                 // close the file
00644                 newFile.close();
00645                 return;
00646         }
00647 
00648     // close the file
00649     newFile.close();
00650 
00651         // tell library to register the vlnv
00652         data_->addVLNV(vlnv, filePath);
00653 }
00654 
00655 void LibraryHandler::writeModelToFile( QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> model ) {
00656         
00657         Q_ASSERT(data_->contains(*model->getVlnv()));
00658 
00659         // make sure the object is parsed again next time
00660         VLNV objectVLNV = *model->getVlnv();
00661         objects_.remove(objectVLNV);
00662 
00663         QString filePath = data_->getPath(*model->getVlnv());
00664 
00665         // create file info instance representing the file in the path
00666         QFileInfo oldFileInfo;
00667         oldFileInfo.setFile(filePath);
00668 
00669         // remove the old file
00670         if (oldFileInfo.exists()) {
00671                 QFile oldFile(oldFileInfo.filePath());
00672                 oldFile.remove();
00673         }
00674 
00675         // create a new file
00676         QFile newFile(filePath);
00677         if (!newFile.open(QFile::WriteOnly | QFile::Truncate)) {
00678                 emit errorMessage(tr("Could not open file %1 for writing").arg(filePath));
00679                 return;
00680         }
00681 
00682         // write the parsed model
00683         try {
00684                 model->write(newFile);
00685         }
00686         catch (Write_error error) {
00687                 QString errorMsg = QString("%1 %2 within file: %3").arg(
00688                         error.what()).arg(
00689                         error.errorMsg()).arg(
00690                         newFile.fileName());
00691                 emit errorMessage(errorMsg);
00692                 
00693                 // close the file
00694                 newFile.close();
00695                 return;
00696         }
00697 
00698         // close the file
00699         newFile.close();
00700 
00701         onItemSaved(*model->getVlnv());
00702 }
00703 
00704 void LibraryHandler::searchForIPXactFiles(QString const& path)
00705 {
00706     if (!path.isEmpty())
00707     {
00708         data_->searchForFiles(path);
00709     }
00710 }
00711 
00712 
00713 void LibraryHandler::searchForIPXactFiles() {
00714 
00715         QSettings settings;
00716         QString defaultPath = settings.value("general/defaultDir", QDir::homePath()).toString();
00717 
00718         QString path = QFileDialog::getExistingDirectory(this, 
00719                 tr("Select a directory to start searching for IP-Xact files"),
00720                 defaultPath, QFileDialog::ReadOnly);
00721 
00722     if (!path.isEmpty())
00723     {
00724         data_->searchForFiles(path);
00725     }
00726 }
00727 
00728 void LibraryHandler::onCheckLibraryIntegrity() {
00729         data_->checkIntegrity();
00730 }
00731 
00732 void LibraryHandler::getNeededVLNVs( const VLNV& vlnv, QList<VLNV>& list ) {
00733         // if invalid vlnv
00734         if (!vlnv.isValid())
00735                 return;
00736 
00737         // get the vlnvs needed by this vlnv
00738         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComponent = getModel(vlnv);
00739 
00740         // if there was no match for the vlnv
00741         if (!libComponent) {
00742                 emit errorMessage(tr("No item with following info was found in library: \n"
00743                         "Vendor: %1\n"
00744                         "Library: %2\n"
00745                         "Name: %3\n"
00746                         "Version: %4").arg(vlnv.getVendor()).arg(vlnv.getLibrary()).arg(
00747                         vlnv.getName()).arg(vlnv.getVersion()));
00748                 return;
00749         }
00750 
00751         QList<VLNV> tempList = libComponent->getDependentVLNVs();
00752 
00753         // this document is searched so add it to the list
00754         list.append(vlnv);
00755 
00756         // search all documents that are not yet added to the list
00757         for (int i = 0; i < tempList.size(); ++i) {
00758 
00759                 // if the vlnv is not yet added to the list
00760                 if (!list.contains(tempList.at(i))) {
00761 
00762                         // search recursively for vlnvs
00763                         getNeededVLNVs(tempList.at(i), list);
00764                 }
00765         }
00766 }
00767 
00768 void LibraryHandler::getDependencyFiles( const VLNV& vlnv, QStringList& list ) {
00769 
00770         // create the model of the vlnv
00771         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComponent = getModel(vlnv);
00772         QStringList ownList = libComponent->getDependentFiles();
00773 
00774         // go through all files and convert the relative file path to an absolute
00775         // one to make the file accessible in the caller function
00776         for (int i = 0; i < ownList.size(); ++i) {
00777 
00778                 // get path to the IP-Xact document that is used as base for relative
00779                 // file paths
00780                 QString ipPath = data_->getPath(vlnv);
00781 
00782                 QFileInfo ipInfo(ipPath);
00783 
00784                 // if the file can't be found print error to the user
00785                 if (!ipInfo.exists()) {
00786                         emit errorMessage(tr("File %1 can't be found in file system").arg(
00787                                 ipInfo.filePath()));
00788 
00789                         // and continue to next file
00790                         continue;
00791                 }
00792 
00793                 QDir ipDir(ipInfo.absolutePath());
00794 
00795                 // path to the single dependecy file
00796                 QString fullFilePath = ipDir.absoluteFilePath(ownList.at(i));
00797 
00798                 // make sure the file exists
00799                 QFileInfo fileInfo(fullFilePath);
00800                 if (fileInfo.exists() && !list.contains(fileInfo.canonicalFilePath())) {
00801 
00802                         // if file existed and it wasn't yet on the list, add it to the
00803                         // list of files
00804                         list.append(fileInfo.canonicalFilePath());
00805                 }
00806         }
00807 }
00808 
00809 LibraryItem const* LibraryHandler::getTreeRoot() const {
00810         
00811         return treeModel_->getRoot();
00812 }

00816         if (!vlnv.isValid())
00817                 return;
00818 
00819         treeWidget_->selectItem(vlnv);
00820         //hierarchyWidget_->selectItems(vlnv);
00821         return;
00822 }

00827         treeWidget_->selectItem(VLNV());
00828 }

00843 VLNV::IPXactType LibraryHandler::getDocumentType(const VLNV& vlnv) {
00844 
00845         if (!vlnv.isValid())
00846                 return VLNV::INVALID;
00847 
00848         return data_->getType(vlnv);
00849 }
00850 
00851 void LibraryHandler::onEditItem( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
00852 
00853         if (!vlnv.isValid())
00854                 return;
00855 
00856         // if vlnv is for bus
00857         switch (data_->getType(vlnv)) {
00858                 case VLNV::COMPONENT: {
00859                         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = getModel(vlnv);
00860                         QSharedPointer<Component> component = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
00861 
00862                         switch (component->getComponentImplementation()) {
00863                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_SYS: {
00864                         emit openSystem(vlnv);
00865                         break;
00866                                                                            }
00867                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_SW: {
00868 
00869                         if (component->getComponentSWType() == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_MAPPING)
00870             {
00871                 emit openSWDesign(vlnv);
00872             }
00873             else
00874             {
00875                             emit openComponent(vlnv);
00876             }
00877                         break;
00878                                                                           }
00879                 default: {
00880                         emit openComponent(vlnv);
00881                         break;
00882                                  }
00883                         }
00884                         return;
00885                                                           }
00886                 case VLNV::BUSDEFINITION: {
00887                                                 
00888                         // find the child items of the bus definition
00889                         QList<VLNV> absDefVLNVs;
00890                         hierarchyModel_->getChildren(absDefVLNVs, vlnv);
00891                         
00892                         // if theres exactly one abstraction definition per bus definition
00893                         if (absDefVLNVs.size() == 1) {
00894                                 emit openBus(vlnv, absDefVLNVs.first(), false);
00895                         }
00896 
00897                         // if the abstraction definition can not be identified by the bus definition.
00898                         else
00899                                 emit openBus(vlnv, VLNV(), false);
00900                         return;
00901                                                                   }
00902                 case VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION: {
00903 
00904                         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = getModel(vlnv);
00905                         QSharedPointer<AbstractionDefinition> absDef = libComp.staticCast<AbstractionDefinition>();
00906 
00907                         VLNV busDefVLNV = absDef->getBusType();
00908 
00909                         if (!data_->contains(busDefVLNV)) {
00910                                 QString message(tr("Library does not contain bus definition " 
00911                                         "%1:%2:%3:%4").arg(busDefVLNV.getVendor()).arg(
00912                                         busDefVLNV.getLibrary()).arg(
00913                                         busDefVLNV.getName()).arg(
00914                                         busDefVLNV.getVersion()));
00915                                 message += tr(" required by abstraction definition %1:%2:%3:%4").arg(
00916                                         vlnv.getVendor()).arg(
00917                                         vlnv.getLibrary()).arg(
00918                                         vlnv.getName()).arg(
00919                                         vlnv.getVersion());
00920                                 emit errorMessage(message);
00921                                 return;
00922                         }
00923                         
00924                         // find the child items of the bus definition
00925                         QList<VLNV> absDefVLNVs;
00926                         hierarchyModel_->getChildren(absDefVLNVs, busDefVLNV);
00927 
00928                         // if theres exactly one abstraction definition per bus definition
00929                         if (absDefVLNVs.size() == 1 && absDefVLNVs.first() == vlnv) {
00930                                 emit openBus(busDefVLNV, vlnv, false);
00931                         }
00932 
00933                         // if there are multiple abstraction definitions for that one bus def
00934                         else {
00935                                 emit openBus(busDefVLNV, vlnv, true);
00936                         }
00937                         return;
00938                                                                                   }
00939                 default: {
00940                         emit noticeMessage(tr("Item can not be edited."));
00941                         return;
00942                                  }
00943         }       
00944 }
00945 
00946 void LibraryHandler::onOpenDesign( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
00947         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComb = getModel(vlnv);
00948         if (!libComb) {
00949                 emit errorMessage(tr("Component was not found"));
00950                 return;
00951         }
00952 
00953         // make type cast
00954         QSharedPointer<Component> component;
00955         if (libComb->getVlnv()->getType() == VLNV::COMPONENT) {
00956                 QSharedPointer<Component> component = libComb.staticCast<Component>();
00957 
00958                 QStringList views = component->getHierViews();
00959 
00960                 // if component does not have any views
00961                 if (views.size() == 0) {
00962                         return;
00963                 }
00964                 emit openDesign(vlnv, views.first());
00965         }
00966 }
00967 
00968 void LibraryHandler::onCreateNewItem( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
00969 
00970         bool showAttributes = true;
00971         if (vlnv.getType() != VLNV::COMPONENT)
00972                 showAttributes = false;
00973 
00974     NewObjectDialog newDesignDialog(this, vlnv.getType(), showAttributes, this);
00975 
00976         if (contains(vlnv) && getDocumentType(vlnv) == VLNV::COMPONENT) {
00977         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = getModel(vlnv);
00978         QSharedPointer<Component> comp = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
00979 
00980         KactusAttribute::ProductHierarchy prodHier = comp->getComponentHierarchy();
00981         KactusAttribute::Firmness firmness = comp->getComponentFirmness();
00982 
00983         newDesignDialog.setKactusAttributes(prodHier, firmness);
00984     }
00985 
00986     newDesignDialog.setVLNV(vlnv);
00987         
00988         switch (vlnv.getType()) {
00989                 case VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION:
00990                 case VLNV::BUSDEFINITION: {
00991                         newDesignDialog.setWindowTitle("Set new bus VLNV");
00992                         break;
00993                                                                   }
00994                 case VLNV::COMPONENT: {
00995                         newDesignDialog.setWindowTitle("Set new component VLNV");
00996                         break;
00997                                                           }
00998         }
00999 
01000         newDesignDialog.exec();
01001 
01002         // if user clicked cancel
01003         if (newDesignDialog.result() == QDialog::Rejected) {
01004                 return;
01005         }
01006 
01007         VLNV newVlnv = newDesignDialog.getVLNV();
01008         QString directory = newDesignDialog.getPath();
01009         QString filePath = directory + "/" + newVlnv.getName() + 
01010                 "." + newVlnv.getVersion() + ".xml";
01011 
01012         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp;
01013 
01014         // create an object of correct type
01015         switch (vlnv.getType()) {
01016                 case VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION:
01017                 case VLNV::BUSDEFINITION: {
01018                         emit createBus(newVlnv, directory);
01019                         return;
01020                                                                   }
01021                 case VLNV::COMPONENT: {
01022                         emit createComponent(newDesignDialog.getProductHierarchy(),
01023                                  newDesignDialog.getFirmness(),
01024                                  newVlnv, directory);
01025                         return;
01026                                                           }
01027                 default: {
01028                         emit noticeMessage(tr("The item type is not supported"));
01029                         return;
01030                                  }
01031         }
01032 }
01033 
01034 void LibraryHandler::onCreateAbsDef( const VLNV& busDefVLNV ) {
01035         if (!busDefVLNV.isValid())
01036                 return;
01037         
01038         Q_ASSERT(getDocumentType(busDefVLNV) == VLNV::BUSDEFINITION);
01039         Q_ASSERT(data_->contains(busDefVLNV));
01040 
01041         QString busDefPath = data_->getPath(busDefVLNV);
01042         QFileInfo busDefInfo(busDefPath);
01043         QString directory = busDefInfo.absolutePath();
01044 
01045         // find the child items of the bus definition
01046         QList<VLNV> absDefVLNVs;
01047         hierarchyModel_->getChildren(absDefVLNVs, busDefVLNV);
01048 
01049         // if theres no previous abstraction definition for given bus def
01050         if (absDefVLNVs.isEmpty()) {
01051                 emit createAbsDef(busDefVLNV, directory, false);
01052         }
01053 
01054         // if the abstraction definition can not be identified by the bus definition.
01055         else
01056                 emit createAbsDef(busDefVLNV, directory, true);
01057 }
01058 
01059 void LibraryHandler::onCreateDesign( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
01060         emit openDesign(vlnv, QString());
01061 }
01062 
01063 // void LibraryHandler::updatePath( const VLNV& vlnv, const QString& path ) {
01064 //      data_->updatePath(vlnv, path);
01065 // }
01066 
01067 void LibraryHandler::updateComponentFiles( const VLNV& oldComponent, 
01068                                                                                   const VLNV& newComponent ) {
01069 
01070         if (!data_->contains(oldComponent) || !data_->contains(newComponent)) {
01071                 emit errorMessage(tr("Component was not found within library"));
01072                 return;
01073         }
01074         else if (data_->getType(oldComponent) != VLNV::COMPONENT ||
01075                 data_->getType(newComponent) != VLNV::COMPONENT) {
01076                         emit errorMessage(tr("Given VLNV was not component"));
01077                         return;
01078         }
01079 
01080         // parse the components
01081         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> old = getModel(oldComponent);
01082         QSharedPointer<Component> oldComp = old.staticCast<Component>();
01083 
01084         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> newC = getModel(newComponent);
01085         QSharedPointer<Component> newComp = newC.staticCast<Component>();
01086 
01087         // get the paths to the xml files
01088         QFileInfo sourceInfo(data_->getPath(oldComponent));
01089         QString sourcePath = sourceInfo.absolutePath();
01090         QFileInfo targetInfo(data_->getPath(newComponent));
01091         QString targetPath = targetInfo.absolutePath();
01092 
01093         // update the file paths and copy necessary files
01094         newComp->updateFiles(*oldComp, sourcePath, targetPath);
01095 
01096         // write the new component to file system
01097         writeModelToFile(newComp);
01098 }
01099 
01100 VLNV* LibraryHandler::getOriginalPointer( const VLNV& vlnv ) const {
01101         return data_->getOriginalPointer(vlnv);
01102 }
01103 
01104 int LibraryHandler::referenceCount( const VLNV& vlnv ) const {
01105         QList<VLNV> list;
01106         hierarchyModel_->getOwners(list, vlnv);
01107         return list.size();
01108 }
01109 
01110 int LibraryHandler::getOwners( QList<VLNV>& list, const VLNV& vlnvToSearch ) const {
01111         hierarchyModel_->getOwners(list, vlnvToSearch);
01112         return list.size();
01113 }
01114 
01115 void LibraryHandler::removeObject( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
01116 
01117         if (!vlnv.isValid())
01118                 return;
01119         else if (!data_->contains(vlnv))
01120                 return;
01121 
01122         objects_.remove(vlnv);
01123 
01124         QString vlnvPath = data_->getPath(vlnv);
01125 
01126         // tell each model to remove the object
01127         VLNV* vlnvPointer = data_->getOriginalPointer(vlnv);
01128         treeModel_->onRemoveVLNV(vlnvPointer);
01129         hierarchyModel_->onRemoveVLNV(vlnvPointer);
01130         data_->onRemoveVLNV(vlnvPointer);
01131 
01132         QFile xmlFile(vlnvPath);
01133         if (xmlFile.exists()) {
01134         
01135                 if (!xmlFile.remove()) {
01136                         emit errorMessage(tr("Could not remove file %1").arg(vlnvPath));
01137                 }
01138         }
01139         else {
01140                 emit errorMessage(tr("File %1 was not found in file system").arg(vlnvPath));
01141         }
01142 }
01143 
01144 void LibraryHandler::removeObjects( const QList<VLNV>& vlnvList ) {
01145 
01146         QList<VLNV*> originalPointers;
01147         foreach (VLNV vlnv, vlnvList) {
01148                 VLNV* vlnvP = data_->getOriginalPointer(vlnv);
01149                 if (vlnvP)
01150                         originalPointers.append(vlnvP);
01151         }
01152 
01153         if (!originalPointers.isEmpty())
01154                 onRemoveVLNV(originalPointers);
01155 }
01156 
01157 void LibraryHandler::onRemoveVLNV( QList<VLNV*> vlnvs ) {
01158 
01159         // create the dialog to select which items to remove
01160         ObjectRemoveDialog removeDialog(this);
01161 
01162         QStringList vlnvPaths;
01163 
01164         foreach (VLNV* vlnv, vlnvs) {
01165 
01166                 if (!vlnv)
01167                         continue;
01168 
01169                 // if the vlnv is not found in the library
01170                 if (!data_->contains(*vlnv)) {
01171                         objects_.remove(*vlnv);
01172                         continue;
01173                 }
01174 
01175                 // path to the given vlnv file
01176                 vlnvPaths.append(data_->getPath(*vlnv));
01177 
01178                 // the vlnv and it's file to the dialog
01179                 removeDialog.createItem(*vlnv, true);
01180 
01181                 switch (data_->getType(*vlnv)) {
01182                 case VLNV::COMPONENT: {
01183                         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = getModel(*vlnv);
01184                         QSharedPointer<Component> component = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
01185 
01186                         // ask the component for all it's hierarchical references
01187                         QList<VLNV> hierRefs = component->getHierRefs();
01188                         foreach (VLNV ref, hierRefs) {
01189 
01190                                 // if the vlnv is not found in library
01191                                 if (!data_->contains(ref))
01192                                         continue;
01193 
01194                                 switch (data_->getType(ref)) {
01195                                         case VLNV::DESIGNCONFIGURATION: {
01196                                                 if (data_->contains(ref)) {
01197 
01198                                                         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libDes = getModel(ref);
01199                                                         QSharedPointer<DesignConfiguration> desConf = libDes.staticCast<DesignConfiguration>();
01200 
01201                                                         removeDialog.createItem(ref);
01202 
01203                                                         // if library contains the design reference then add it to the dialog list.
01204                                                         VLNV designVLNV = desConf->getDesignRef();
01205                                                         if (data_->contains(designVLNV)) {
01206                                                                 removeDialog.createItem(designVLNV);
01207                                                         }
01208                                                 }
01209                                                 break;
01210                                                                                                         }
01211                                         case VLNV::DESIGN: {
01212                                                 if (data_->contains(ref)) {
01213                                                         removeDialog.createItem(ref);
01214                                                 }
01215                                                 break;
01216                                                                            }
01217                                         default:
01218                                                 continue;
01219                                 }
01220                         }
01221 
01222                         // ask the component for all it's file references
01223                         QStringList files = component->getFiles();
01224                         QString compPath = data_->getPath(*vlnv);
01225                         foreach (QString relPath, files) {
01226                                 QString absPath = General::getAbsolutePath(compPath, relPath);
01227                                 if (!absPath.isEmpty())
01228                                         removeDialog.createItem(absPath);
01229                         }
01230                         break;
01231                                                           }
01232                 case VLNV::DESIGNCONFIGURATION: {
01233                         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = getModel(*vlnv);
01234                         QSharedPointer<DesignConfiguration> desConf = libComp.staticCast<DesignConfiguration>();
01235 
01236                         // if library contains the design reference then add it to the dialog list.
01237                         VLNV designVLNV = desConf->getDesignRef();
01238                         if (data_->contains(designVLNV)) {
01239                                 removeDialog.createItem(designVLNV);
01240                         }
01241                         break;
01242                                                                                 }
01243                 case VLNV::BUSDEFINITION: {
01244                         
01245                         // find the child items of the bus definition
01246                         QList<VLNV> absDefVLNVs;
01247                         hierarchyModel_->getChildren(absDefVLNVs, *vlnv);
01248 
01249                         // if bus definition is removed then ask to remove all it's 
01250                         // abstraction definitions also.
01251                         foreach (VLNV absDefVLNV, absDefVLNVs) {
01252                                 // if abstraction definition exists in the library
01253                                 if (data_->contains(absDefVLNV)) {
01254 
01255                                         // add the abstraction definition to the dialog list
01256                                         removeDialog.createItem(absDefVLNV);
01257                                 }
01258                         }
01259                         
01260                         break;
01261                                                                   }
01262                 case VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION: {
01263 
01264                         // parse the abstraction definition
01265                         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = getModel(*vlnv);
01266                         QSharedPointer<AbstractionDefinition> absDef = libComp.staticCast<AbstractionDefinition>();
01267 
01268                         // find abs def's bus definition
01269                         VLNV busDefVLNV = absDef->getBusType();
01270                         
01271                         // if bus definition is not found
01272                         if (!data_->contains(busDefVLNV))
01273                                 break;
01274 
01275                         // find the child items of the bus definition
01276                         QList<VLNV> absDefVLNVs;
01277                         hierarchyModel_->getChildren(absDefVLNVs, busDefVLNV);
01278 
01279                         // if theres only this abs def for the bus def
01280                         if (absDefVLNVs.size() == 1 && absDefVLNVs.first() == *vlnv)
01281                                 // also add the bus definition to the list of removable items
01282                                 removeDialog.createItem(busDefVLNV);
01283 
01284                         break;
01285                                                                                   }
01286                 default: {
01287                         break;
01288                                  }
01289                 }
01290         }
01291 
01292         int result = removeDialog.exec();
01293         
01294         // if user clicked cancel
01295         if (result == QDialog::Rejected)
01296                 return;
01297 
01298         QList<ObjectRemoveModel::Item> itemsToRemove = removeDialog.getItemsToRemove();
01299         foreach (ObjectRemoveModel::Item item, itemsToRemove) {
01300                 
01301                 // if this is vlnv object then remove it from library
01302                 if (item.type_ == ObjectRemoveModel::VLNVOBJECT) {
01303 
01304                         // remove the item from the parsed objects
01305                         objects_.remove(item.vlnv_);
01306 
01307                         // get the path to the xml-file
01308                         QString objectPath = data_->getPath(item.vlnv_);
01309 
01310                         // tell each model to remove the object
01311                         VLNV* vlnvPointer = data_->getOriginalPointer(item.vlnv_);
01312                         treeModel_->onRemoveVLNV(vlnvPointer);
01313                         hierarchyModel_->onRemoveVLNV(vlnvPointer);
01314                         data_->onRemoveVLNV(vlnvPointer);
01315 
01316                         QFile xmlFile(objectPath);
01317                         if (!xmlFile.remove())
01318                                 emit errorMessage(tr("File %1 could not be removed from file system.").arg(
01319                                 objectPath));
01320                 }
01321                 // if this is file then remove it from file system
01322                 else {
01323                         QFileInfo fileInfo(item.path_);
01324                         if (fileInfo.exists()) {
01325 
01326                                 // remove the file specified by path
01327                                 QFile file(item.path_);
01328                                 if (!file.remove())
01329                                         emit errorMessage(tr("File %1 could not be removed from file system.").arg(
01330                                         item.path_));
01331 
01332                                 // check if the directory contains other files
01333                                 QDir dir = fileInfo.absoluteDir();
01334                                 dir.rmdir(fileInfo.absolutePath());
01335                         }
01336                 }
01337         }
01338 
01339         // remove the directory that contains the object name if the directory is empty
01340         foreach (QString vlnvPath, vlnvPaths) {
01341                 QFileInfo vlnvInfo(vlnvPath);
01342                 QDir vlnvDir(vlnvInfo.absoluteDir());
01343                 if (vlnvDir.rmdir(vlnvDir.absolutePath())) {
01344                         vlnvDir.cdUp();
01345                         vlnvDir.rmdir(vlnvDir.absolutePath());
01346                 }
01347         }
01348 }
01349 
01350 void LibraryHandler::onItemSaved( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
01351         if (!vlnv.isValid())
01352                 return;
01353 
01354         VLNV savedItem = vlnv;
01355         savedItem.setType(data_->getType(vlnv));
01356 
01357         // make sure the model is parsed again next time to make all changes available
01358         objects_.remove(vlnv);
01359 
01360         switch (savedItem.getType()) {
01361                 case VLNV::COMPONENT: {
01362                         hierarchyModel_->onComponentSaved(savedItem);
01363                         return;
01364                                                           }
01365                 default: 
01366                         return;
01367         }
01368 }
01369 
01370 VLNV LibraryHandler::getDesignVLNV( const VLNV& hierarchyRef ) {
01371         if (!data_->contains(hierarchyRef)) {
01372                 emit errorMessage(tr("VLNV: %1:%2:%3:%4 was not found in library.").arg(
01373                         hierarchyRef.getVendor()).arg(
01374                         hierarchyRef.getLibrary()).arg(
01375                         hierarchyRef.getName()).arg(
01376                         hierarchyRef.getVersion()));
01377                 return VLNV();
01378         }
01379 
01380         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = getModel(hierarchyRef);
01381 
01382         // if the hierarchical reference was for design configuration
01383         if (data_->getType(hierarchyRef) == VLNV::DESIGNCONFIGURATION) {
01384                 QSharedPointer<DesignConfiguration> desConf = libComp.staticCast<DesignConfiguration>();
01385 
01386                 VLNV designVLNV = desConf->getDesignRef();
01387                 // if design vlnv was not found in library
01388                 if (!data_->contains(designVLNV)) {
01389                         QString errorMsg(tr("VLNV: %1:%2:%3:%4 was not found in library.").arg(
01390                                 designVLNV.getVendor()).arg(designVLNV.getLibrary()).arg(designVLNV.getName()).arg(
01391                                 designVLNV.getVersion()));
01392                         emit errorMessage(errorMsg);
01393                         return VLNV();
01394                 }
01395                 // if the vlnv is not for design
01396                 else if (data_->getType(designVLNV) != VLNV::DESIGN) {
01397                         QString errorMsg(tr("VLNV: %1:%2:%3:%4 was not for design.").arg(
01398                                 designVLNV.getVendor()).arg(designVLNV.getLibrary()).arg(designVLNV.getName()).arg(
01399                                 designVLNV.getVersion()));
01400                         emit errorMessage(errorMsg);
01401                         return VLNV();
01402                 }
01403                 designVLNV.setType(VLNV::DESIGN);
01404                 return designVLNV;
01405         }
01406 
01407         // if the hierarchical reference was directly for a design
01408         else if (data_->getType(hierarchyRef) == VLNV::DESIGN) {
01409                 return hierarchyRef;
01410         }
01411         // if hierarchy reference is not for design or design configuration
01412         else {
01413                 emit errorMessage(tr("VLNV: %1:%2:%3:%4 was not valid hierarchical reference.").arg(
01414                         hierarchyRef.getVendor()).arg(
01415                         hierarchyRef.getLibrary()).arg(
01416                         hierarchyRef.getName()).arg(
01417                         hierarchyRef.getVersion()));
01418                 return VLNV();
01419         }
01420 }
01421 
01422 QSharedPointer<Design> LibraryHandler::getDesign( const VLNV& hierarchyRef ) {
01423         if (!data_->contains(hierarchyRef)) {
01424                 emit errorMessage(tr("VLNV: %1:%2:%3:%4 was not found in library.").arg(
01425                         hierarchyRef.getVendor()).arg(
01426                         hierarchyRef.getLibrary()).arg(
01427                         hierarchyRef.getName()).arg(
01428                         hierarchyRef.getVersion()));
01429                 return QSharedPointer<Design>();
01430         }
01431 
01432         // get the vlnv for the design
01433         VLNV designVlnv = getDesignVLNV(hierarchyRef);
01434         
01435         // if design was found
01436         if (designVlnv.isValid()) {
01437                 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = getModel(designVlnv);
01438                 return libComp.staticCast<Design>();
01439         }
01440         // design was not found
01441         else {
01442                 return QSharedPointer<Design>();
01443         }
01444 }
